title: TD, Scotiabank Issue $11 Billion of Repo-Eligible Bonds - Yahoo Canada Finance
description: (Bloomberg) -- Toronto-Dominion Bank priced the largest covered bond on record from a Canadian lender on Friday, days after the country’s central bank widened the range of securities it takes as guarantee for repurchase transactions. Bank of Nova Scotia follo…
